text: Luciano Secchi better known by his pen name Max Bunker (Born 1939) is an italian comic book author from Milan co-author alongside Magnus of many comic book characters including Satanik and Alan Ford. He is the father of comic book author Riccardo Secchi. Category:1939 births Category:Writers from Milan Category:Artists from Milan Category:Italian comics artists Category:Living people
title: Max Bunker
